review: "The Ethan I Was Before" is a touching and well-crafted story that explores themes of loss, friendship, and the resilience of the human spirit. Ethan's journey from Boston to Palm Knot, Georgia, and his evolving relationship with the charismatic Coralee, is both heartwarming and thought-provoking. The author skillfully balances the emotional depth of the characters with a compelling plot that keeps you engaged until the last page.
